#<TPS Cold Dead Hands>

    # TPS Cold Dead Hands v1.0.0-prerelease
    # by Apocalyptech
    # Licensed under Public Domain / CC0 1.0 Universal
    #
    # Enemies will always drop the exact gun/shield that they were using, and
    # weapons/shields are in general not otherwise findable in the world (treasure chests,
    # for instance, will not contain guns or shields).
    #
    # In the default configuration, enemy gear is MUCH improved from stock -- you will be
    # fighting enemies with gemstones, glitch, and even legendaries, across all weapon
    # types.  Various options for controlling the quality of gear used by enemies (and
    # thus available to yourself) can be found below.  See the README file for full
    # details.

    #<Main Mod (best to leave all this checked)>

        #<Skinpool Setup>

            # This section is copied directly from my "TPS Skinpool Reassignments" mod,
            # which frees up some 600 skin/head pools for use in mods.  I expect that
            # that'll eventually get folded into TPS UCP, assuming there's a new version
            # of that at some point.  For now, I'd rather not introduce a dependency with
            # the other mod, so I'm just copying over the necessary stuff.

            #<hotfix><key>"SparkLevelPatchEntry-ApocTPSSkinpool220"</key><value>",GD_CustomItemPools_MainGame.Rewards.DigitalEdSkins,BalancedItems[2].ItmPoolDefinition,,None"</value><on>

        #</Skinpool Setup>

        #<Disable World Weapon/Shield Drops>

            # This section disables world drops for weapons and shields, so those items will
            # only drop from what the enemies are carrying.  Rather than deleting/disabling
            # the items entirely, we're changing them to draw from an ammo/money pool so that
            # the rest of the probabilities in the pools aren't affected.
            #
            # Note that this doesn't *completely* get rid of world weapon/shield drops, but it
            # should get rid of the vast majority of them.

            #<Remove Weapons and Shields from Enemy Drops>

                #<Main Weapon/Shield-Removing Hotfixes for Enemies>

                    #<hotfix><key>"SparkLevelPatchEntry-ApocDisableBalanced0"</key><value>",GD_Itempools.GeneralItemPools.Pool_Gear,BalancedItems[0].ItmPoolDefinition,,ItemPoolDefinition'GD_Itempools.LootablePools.Pool_Locker_Items_CashAndAmmo'"</value><on>

                    #<hotfix><key>"SparkLevelPatchEntry-ApocDisableBalanced1"</key><value>",GD_Itempools.GeneralItemPools.Pool_Gear,BalancedItems[0].InvBalanceDefinition,,None"</value><on>

                    #<hotfix><key>"SparkLevelPatchEntry-ApocDisableBalanced2"</key><value>",GD_Itempools.GeneralItemPools.Pool_GunsAndGear,BalancedItems[0].ItmPoolDefinition,,ItemPoolDefinition'GD_Itempools.LootablePools.Pool_Locker_Items_CashAndAmmo'"</value><on>

                    #<hotfix><key>"SparkLevelPatchEntry-ApocDisableBalanced3"</key><value>",GD_Itempools.GeneralItemPools.Pool_GunsAndGear,BalancedItems[0].InvBalanceDefinition,,None"</value><on>

                #</Main Weapon/Shield-Removing Hotfixes for Enemies>

                #<Badass+ Drop Pools>

                    # Various Badass-and-up pools explicitly use some pools which we don't
                    # actually want to touch directly.  Rather than hotfixing these, for Better
                    # Loot compatibility, we're just going to redefine these pools entirely.
                    #
                    # These definitions were taken from my Better Loot mod, and have enhanced
                    # moonstone+cash rewards compared to the stock pools.

                    #<Badass Enemies>

                        set GD_Itempools.ListDefs.BadassEnemyGunsAndGear ItemPools ((ItemPool=ItemPoolDefinition'GD_Itempools.GeneralItemPools.Pool_GunsAndGear',PoolProbability=(BaseValueConstant=1.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(ItemPool=ItemPoolDefinition'GD_Itempools.Treasure_ChestPools.Pool_EpicChest_Weapons_GunsAndGear',PoolProbability=(BaseValueConstant=1.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(ItemPool=ItemPoolDefinition'GD_Itempools.VehicleSkins.Pool_VehicleSkins_All',PoolProbability=(BaseValueConstant=0.000000,BaseValueAttribute=AttributeDefinition'GD_Itempools.DropWeights.DropODDS_VehicleSkins',InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(ItemPool=ItemPoolDefinition'GD_Itempools.AmmoAndResourcePools.Pool_Money_1_BIG',PoolProbability=(BaseValueConstant=1.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(ItemPool=ItemPoolDefinition'GD_Itempools.AmmoAndResourcePools.Pool_Moonstone',PoolProbability=(BaseValueConstant=1.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(ItemPool=ItemPoolDefinition'GD_Itempools.AmmoAndResourcePools.Pool_Moonstone',PoolProbability=(BaseValueConstant=0.500000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(ItemPool=ItemPoolDefinition'GD_Itempools.AmmoAndResourcePools.Pool_Moonstone_Cluster',PoolProbability=(BaseValueConstant=1.000000,BaseValueAttribute=AttributeDefinition'GD_Itempools.DropWeights.DropODDS_MoonstoneCluster',InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=10.000000)),(ItemPool=ItemPoolDefinition'GD_Itempools.AmmoAndResourcePools.Pool_Health_All',PoolProbability=(BaseValueConstant=0.000000,BaseValueAttribute=AttributeDefinition'GD_Itempools.DropWeights.DropODDS_Health',InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(ItemPool=ItemPoolDefinition'GD_Itempools.AmmoAndResourcePools.Pool_Oxygen_Instant',PoolProbability=(BaseValueConstant=0.000000,BaseValueAttribute=AttributeDefinition'GD_Itempools.DropWeights.DropODDS_Oxygen',InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(ItemPool=ItemPoolDefinition'GD_Itempools.AmmoAndResourcePools.Pool_Ammo_All_NeedOnly',PoolProbability=(BaseValueConstant=0.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=AttributeInitializationDefinition'GD_Balance.WeightingPlayerCount.AmmoDrops_PerPlayer',BaseValueScaleConstant=0.500000)),(ItemPool=ItemPoolDefinition'GD_Itempools.AmmoAndResourcePools.Pool_Ammo_All_Emergency',PoolProbability=(BaseValueConstant=1.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)))

                        set GD_Ma_ItemPools.ListDefs.BadassEnemyGunsAndGear_Marigold ItemPools ((ItemPool=ItemPoolDefinition'GD_Itempools.GeneralItemPools.Pool_GunsAndGear',PoolProbability=(BaseValueConstant=1.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(ItemPool=ItemPoolDefinition'GD_Itempools.Treasure_ChestPools.Pool_EpicChest_Weapons_GunsAndGear',PoolProbability=(BaseValueConstant=1.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(ItemPool=ItemPoolDefinition'GD_Itempools.VehicleSkins.Pool_VehicleSkins_All',PoolProbability=(BaseValueConstant=0.000000,BaseValueAttribute=AttributeDefinition'GD_Itempools.DropWeights.DropODDS_VehicleSkins',InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(ItemPool=ItemPoolDefinition'GD_Itempools.AmmoAndResourcePools.Pool_Money_1_BIG',PoolProbability=(BaseValueConstant=1.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(ItemPool=ItemPoolDefinition'GD_Itempools.AmmoAndResourcePools.Pool_Moonstone',PoolProbability=(BaseValueConstant=1.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(ItemPool=ItemPoolDefinition'GD_Itempools.AmmoAndResourcePools.Pool_Moonstone',PoolProbability=(BaseValueConstant=0.500000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(ItemPool=ItemPoolDefinition'GD_Itempools.AmmoAndResourcePools.Pool_Moonstone_Cluster',PoolProbability=(BaseValueConstant=1.000000,BaseValueAttribute=AttributeDefinition'GD_Itempools.DropWeights.DropODDS_MoonstoneCluster',InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=10.000000)),(ItemPool=ItemPoolDefinition'GD_Itempools.AmmoAndResourcePools.Pool_Health_All',PoolProbability=(BaseValueConstant=0.000000,BaseValueAttribute=AttributeDefinition'GD_Itempools.DropWeights.DropODDS_Health',InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(ItemPool=ItemPoolDefinition'GD_Itempools.AmmoAndResourcePools.Pool_Ammo_All_NeedOnly',PoolProba                     #</Badass Enemies>

                    #<Super Badass Enemies>

                        # "Super Badass" actually refers to a number of specific enemies in the game,
                        # not actual Badasses.  Included here are RedBelly, Felicity Rampant, Meg,
                        # etc.

        #<Nerf Vending Machines>

            # We're not completely removing weapons and shields from vending machines,
            # mostly because they'd become a bit pointless.  Instead we're restricting
            # the number of items in shield + weapon machines to 2, and removing the
            # item of the day from the weapons machine.

            #<hotfix><key>"SparkLevelPatchEntry-ApocVendorNerf0"</key><value>",GD_ItemPools_Shop.Items.Shoppool_Weapons_FlatChance,Quantity.BaseValueConstant,,2"</value><on>

            #<hotfix><key>"SparkLevelPatchEntry-ApocVendorNerf1"</key><value>",GD_ItemPools_Shop.HealthShop.HealthShop_Items,Quantity.BaseValueConstant,,2"</value><on>

            #<hotfix><key>"SparkLevelPatchEntry-ApocVendorNerf2"</key><value>",GD_ItemPools_Shop.WeaponPools.Shoppool_IOTD_WeaponMachine,Quantity.BaseValueConstant,,0"</value><on>

                set GD_CustomItemPools_MainGame.Lawbringer.Gray BalancedItems ((ItmPoolDefinition=ItemPoolDefinition'GD_CustomItemPools_MainGame.Prototype.GreenNinja',InvBalanceDefinition=None,Probability=(BaseValueConstant=100,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1),bDropOnDeath=True),(ItmPoolDefinition=ItemPoolDefinition'GD_CustomItemPools_MainGame.Prototype.GreenBold',InvBalanceDefinition=None,Probability=(BaseValueConstant=250.0,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1),bDropOnDeath=True),(ItmPoolDefinition=ItemPoolDefinition'GD_CustomItemPools_MainGame.Enforcer.Gearbox',InvBalanceDefinition=None,Probability=(BaseValueConstant=100,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1),bDropOnDeath=True),(ItmPoolDefinition=ItemPoolDefinition'GD_CustomItemPools_MainGame.Prototype.GreenPale',InvBalanceDefinition=None,Probability=(BaseValueConstant=100,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1),bDropOnDeath=True),(ItmPoolDefinition=ItemPoolDefinition'GD_CustomItemPools_MainGame.Enforcer.Gray',InvBalanceDefinition=None,Probability=(BaseValueConstant=80,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1),bDropOnDeath=True),(ItmPoolDefinition=ItemPoolDefinition'GD_CustomItemPools_MainGame.Prototype.GreenBoldAccent',InvBalanceDefinition=None,Probability=(BaseValueConstant=40,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=0),bDropOnDeath=True),(ItmPoolDefinition=ItemPoolDefinition'GD_CustomItemPools_MainGame.Gladiator.Gearbox',InvBalanceDefinition=None,Probability=(BaseValueConstant=80,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1),bDropOnDeath=True))

                # Only Shotguns

                set GD_CustomItemPools_MainGame.Prototype.Gearbox bAutoReadyItems True 

                set GD_CustomItemPools_MainGame.Prototype.Gearbox BalancedItems ((ItmPoolDefinition=ItemPoolDefinition'GD_CustomItemPools_MainGame.Prototype.GreenPale',InvBalanceDefinition=None,Probability=(BaseValueConstant=1,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1),bDropOnDeath=True))

                # Weighted Lasers

                set GD_CustomItemPools_MainGame.Prototype.Gray bAutoReadyItems True 

                set GD_CustomItemPools_MainGame.Prototype.Gray BalancedItems ((ItmPoolDefinition=ItemPoolDefinition'GD_CustomItemPools_MainGame.Prototype.GreenNinja',InvBalanceDefinition=None,Probability=(BaseValueConstant=100,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1),bDropOnDeath=True),(ItmPoolDefinition=ItemPoolDefinition'GD_CustomItemPools_MainGame.Prototype.GreenBold',InvBalanceDefinition=None,Probability=(BaseValueConstant=100,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1),bDropOnDeath=True),(ItmPoolDefinition=ItemPoolDefinition'GD_CustomItemPools_MainGame.Enforcer.Gearbox',InvBalanceDefinition=None,Probability=(BaseValueConstant=100,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1),bDropOnDeath=True),(ItmPoolDefinition=ItemPoolDefinition'GD_CustomItemPools_MainGame.Prototype.GreenPale',InvBalanceDefinition=None,Probability=(BaseValueConstant=100,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1),bDropOnDeath=True),(ItmPoolDefinition=ItemPoolDefinition'GD_CustomItemPools_MainGame.Enforcer.Gray',InvBalanceDefinition=None,Probability=(BaseValueConstant=80,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1),bDropOnDeath=True),(ItmPoolDefinition=ItemPoolDefinition'GD_CustomItemPools_MainGame.Prototype.GreenBoldAccent',InvBalanceDefinition=None,Probability=(BaseValueConstant=40,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=0),bDropOnDeath=True),(ItmPoolDefinition=ItemPoolDefinition'GD_CustomItemPools_MainGame.Gladiator.Gearbox',InvBalanceDefinition=None,Probability=(BaseValueConstant=200.0,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1),bDropOnDeath=True))

            #</Badass Enemies>

            #<Level-Specific Pool Initialization>

                # These pools are used by boss enemies to provide a proper weighted equipment
                # drop, based on the user's selection in the "Bosses Use+Drop Their Unique
                # Weapons" category.  These are re-used by enemies in different levels, to
                # conserve the number of skinpools that this mod reserves.

                set GD_CustomItemPools_MainGame.Prototype.GreenPattern bAutoReadyItems True 

                set GD_CustomItemPools_MainGame.Enforcer.DigitalEdSkins bAutoReadyItems True 

                set GD_CustomItemPools_MainGame.Gladiator.DigitalEdSkins bAutoReadyItems True 

            #</Level-Specific Pool Initialization>

        #</Enemy Weapon Equip Pools>

        #<Other Pool Tweaks>

            #<Flame Knuckle Pool>

                # TPS UCP 2.0 introduced a bug in Flame Knuckle's pool where he no longer
                # has a shield or a weapon.  This fixes that bug, while also ensuring
                # compatibility for folks not using UCP.

                #<hotfix><key>"SparkLevelPatchEntry-ApocFlameKnucklePool0"</key><value>"MoonShotIntro_P,GD_DahlPowersuit_Knuckle.Population.PawnBalance_DahlPowersuit_Knuckle,DefaultItemPoolList[1].PoolProbability.BaseValueConstant,,0"</value><on>

            #<Flame Knuckle Pool (Holodome)>

                # Normalize the Holodome version of Flame Knuckle a bit.  Still had a
                # lot of drops clearly intended to be early-game drops, which we've
                # removed, sets us up to use our badass equip pool for shields, and
                # normalizes his drops across playthroughs.

                #<hotfix><key>"SparkLevelPatchEntry-ApocFlameKnuckleHolodomePool0"</key><value>"Eridian_Slaughter_P,GD_DahlPowersuit_KnuckleRepaired.Population.PawnBalance_DahlSergeantFlameKnuckle,PlayThroughs[1].CustomItemPoolIncludedLists,,()"</value><on>

                #<hotfix><key>"SparkLevelPatchEntry-ApocFlameKnuckleHolodomePool1"</key><value>"Eridian_Slaughter_P,GD_DahlPowersuit_KnuckleRepaired.Population.PawnBalance_DahlSergeantFlameKnuckle,PlayThroughs[1].CustomItemPoolList,,()"</value><on>

                #<hotfix><key>"SparkLevelPatchEntry-ApocFlameKnuckleHolodomePool2"</key><value>"Eridian_Slaughter_P,GD_DahlPowersuit_KnuckleRepaired.Population.PawnBalance_DahlSergeantFlameKnuckle,DefaultItemPoolIncludedLists,,(ItemPoolListDefinition'GD_Itempools.ListDefs.BadassEnemyGunsAndGear')"</value><on>

                #<hotfix><key>"SparkLevelPatchEntry-ApocFlameKnuckleHolodomePool3"</key><value>"Eridian_Slaughter_P,GD_DahlPowersuit_KnuckleRepaired.Population.PawnBalance_DahlSergeantFlameKnuckle,DefaultItemPoolList,,((ItemPool=ItemPoolDefinition'GD_DahlPowersuit_Knuckle.WeaponPools.Pool_Weapons_KnuckleLaser_EnemyUse',PoolProbability=(BaseValueConstant=1.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(ItemPool=ItemPoolDefinition'GD_CustomItemPools_MainGame.Gladiator.Gray',PoolProbability=(BaseValueConstant=1.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)))"</value><on>

            #</Flame Knuckle Pool (Holodome)>

            #<Badass Outlaw Pool>

                # Badass Outlaws use their own custom equip pool, split 80% lasers and 20%
                # launchers.  We're going to continue doing so, using their original pool,
                # since they're the only ones who use it.

                #<hotfix><key>"SparkLevelPatchEntry-ApocBadassOutlawEquip0"</key><value>",GD_BadassSpaceman.ItemPool.ItemPool_BadassOutlaw,BalancedItems[0].ItmPoolDefinition,,ItemPoolDefinition'GD_CustomItemPools_MainGame.Gladiator.Gearbox'"</value><on>

            #</Badass Outlaw Pool>

            #<Corporal Bob>

                # Corporal Bob has a weapon assigned to him in his pool, but he uses a
                # custom flamethrower attack.  We're going to disable that, so he won't
                # actually drop a weapon.

                #<hotfix><key>"SparkLevelPatchEntry-ApocDisable4"</key><value>"CentralTerminal_P,GD_Population_Dahl.Balance.PawnBalance_DahlMarine_CentralTerm,DefaultItemPoolList[0].PoolProbability,,(BaseValueConstant=0,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1)"</value><on>

            #</Corporal Bob>

            #<Lost Legion Sniper Pool Setup>

                # Lost Legion Snipers have their own equip pool which limits them to Dahl
                # snipers, and we've got to play a little game with that to make our uniques
                # handling work properly.

            #<Lost Legion Eternal>

                # When ascending, Lost Legion Eternal (and Eternal) drop from a random
                # pool.  As far as I can tell, there's no way to make them drop the exact
                # weapon they were using.  So instead, I'm just disabling that drop
                # altogether.  Say they've gotta use the smartmatter-or-whatever as energy
                # for their ascension or something.  :)

                #<hotfix><key>"SparkLevelPatchEntry-ApocLostLegionEternal0"</key><value>",GD_DahlFanatic.Character.AIDef_DahlFanatic:AIBehaviorProviderDefinition_0.Behavior_SpawnItems_0,ItemPoolList[0].PoolProbability.BaseValueConstant,,0"</value><on>

            #</Lost Legion Eternal>

            #</Badass Enemies>

        #</Enemy Pool Assignments>

        #<Compatibility with Better Loot Mod>

            # This section is just for compatibility with my BL2 Better Loot mod, and mostly
            # just undoes some statements which Better Loot makes, back to the stock BL2
            # values.  There is no harm in leaving this enabled even if you don't run Better
            # Loot.

            #<Revert Boss Drop Improved Quantities>

                #<Swagman>

                    set GD_Itempools.Runnables.Pool_ScavBadassSpacemanMidget Quantity (BaseValueConstant=1.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)

                #</Swagman>

                #<Lost Legion Powersuit Noob>

                    set GD_Itempools.Runnables.Pool_RedShirt Quantity (BaseValueConstant=1.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)

                #</Lost Legion Powersuit Noob>

            #</Revert Boss Drop Improved Quantities>

        #</Compatibility with Better Loot Mod>

    #</Main Mod (best to leave all this checked)>

    #<Legendary Loot Pool Improvements (Uniques + Legendaries)>

        # Various categories to improve various aspects of the loot enemies spawn with.
        # These can be toggled on or off to suit your desired preferences.

            # what else to put in them (via hotfix) in the next categories.

    #</Legendary Loot Pool Improvements (Uniques + Legendaries)>

    #<Rocket Launchers in Global Equip Pools (choose one)><MUT>

        #<Include Rocket Launchers>

            # Allow any enemy in the game which isn't specifically tied to a single
            # weapon type to equip rocket launchers.  This is pretty fun in Normal,
            # but is probably a bit much for people playing UVHM.

            #<hotfix><key>"SparkLevelPatchEntry-ApocRocketEnable0"</key><value>",GD_CustomItemPools_MainGame.Lawbringer.GreenBold,BalancedItems[5].Probability.BaseValueScaleConstant,,1"</value><on>

            #<hotfix><key>"SparkLevelPatchEntry-ApocRocketEnable1"</key><value>",GD_CustomItemPools_MainGame.Lawbringer.GreenBoldAccent,BalancedItems[5].Probability.BaseValueScaleConstant,,1"</value><on>

            #<hotfix><key>"SparkLevelPatchEntry-ApocRocketEnable2"</key><value>",GD_CustomItemPools_MainGame.Lawbringer.GreenPale,BalancedItems[5].Probability.BaseValueScaleConstant,,1"</value><on>

            #<hotfix><key>"SparkLevelPatchEntry-ApocRocketEnable3"</key><value>",GD_CustomItemPools_MainGame.Lawbringer.Gearbox,BalancedItems[5].Probability.BaseValueScaleConstant,,1"</value><on>

            #<hotfix><key>"SparkLevelPatchEntry-ApocRocketEnable4"</key><value>",GD_CustomItemPools_MainGame.Lawbringer.Gray,BalancedItems[5].Probability.BaseValueScaleConstant,,1"</value><on>

            #<hotfix><key>"SparkLevelPatchEntry-ApocRocketEnable5"</key><value>",GD_CustomItemPools_MainGame.Prototype.Gray,BalancedItems[5].Probability.BaseValueScaleConstant,,1"</value><on>

        #</Include Rocket Launchers>

        #<Exclude Rocket Launchers>

            ## The only enemies who will equip rocket launchers are the ones who are<off>
            ## specifically set to use launchers exclusively.  (This is the Borderlands<off>
            ## default behavior)<off>

            #<hotfix><key>"SparkLevelPatchEntry-ApocRocketDisable0"</key><value>",GD_CustomItemPools_MainGame.Lawbringer.GreenBold,BalancedItems[5].Probability.BaseValueScaleConstant,,0"</value><off>

            #<hotfix><key>"SparkLevelPatchEntry-ApocRocketDisable1"</key><value>",GD_CustomItemPools_MainGame.Lawbringer.GreenBoldAccent,BalancedItems[5].Probability.BaseValueScaleConstant,,0"</value><off>

            #<hotfix><key>"SparkLevelPatchEntry-ApocRocketDisable2"</key><value>",GD_CustomItemPools_MainGame.Lawbringer.GreenPale,BalancedItems[5].Probability.BaseValueScaleConstant,,0"</value><off>

            #<hotfix><key>"SparkLevelPatchEntry-ApocRocketDisable3"</key><value>",GD_CustomItemPools_MainGame.Lawbringer.Gearbox,BalancedItems[5].Probability.BaseValueScaleConstant,,0"</value><off>

            #<hotfix><key>"SparkLevelPatchEntry-ApocRocketDisable4"</key><value>",GD_CustomItemPools_MainGame.Lawbringer.Gray,BalancedItems[5].Probability.BaseValueScaleConstant,,0"</value><off>

            #<hotfix><key>"SparkLevelPatchEntry-ApocRocketDisable5"</key><value>",GD_CustomItemPools_MainGame.Prototype.Gray,BalancedItems[5].Probability.BaseValueScaleConstant,,0"</value><off>

        #</Exclude Rocket Launchers>

    #</Rocket Launchers in Global Equip Pools (choose one)>

    #<Enemy Gear Quality (choose one)><MUT>

        #<Enemies Have Excellent Gear (Glitch weapons in Main Game)>

            #
            # Main Game equip chances:
            #
            #                     Regular  Badass
            #     Common (white):     12%      0%
            #   Uncommon (green):     39%      0%
            #        Rare (blue):     28%     32%
            # Very Rare (purple):     16%     38%
            #      Glitch (pink):      3%     25%
            # Legendary (orange):      1%      5%
            #
            # Claptastic Voyage equip chances:
            #
            #                     Regular  Badass
            #     Common (white):     12%      0%
            #   Uncommon (green):     37%      0%
            #        Rare (blue):     28%     27%
            # Very Rare (purple):     16%     32%
            #      Glitch (pink):      6%     37%
            # Legendary (orange):      1%      4%
            #

            #<Regular Enemies>

            #</Badass Enemies>

            #<Game Intro Dahl Soldier Pools>

                # The Dahl soldiers in the beginning of the game have some custom loot
                # pools.  We're expanding the pools a bit, though we're making sure nothing
                # higher than blue-rarity will spawn, and blue will be less likely than
                # usual.  Also nerfs the shield equip pool during the opening level.

            #<Claptastic Voyage Support>

                # To support increased Glitch weights in Claptastic Voyage, we're using
                # hotfixes to alter the glitch rate depending on if we're in a Claptastic
                # Voyage level or not.  This saves us a bunch of skinpools which we'd
                # otherwise have to reserve.

            #</Badass Enemies>

            #<Game Intro Dahl Soldier Pools>

                ## The Dahl soldiers in the beginning of the game have some custom loot<off>
                ## pools.  We're expanding the pools a bit, though we're making sure nothing<off>
                ## higher than blue-rarity will spawn, and blue will be less likely than<off>
                ## usual.  Also nerfs the shield equip pool during the opening level.<off>

            #</Badass Enemies>

            #<Game Intro Dahl Soldier Pools>

                ## The Dahl soldiers in the beginning of the game have some custom loot<off>
                ## pools.  We're expanding the pools a bit, though we're making sure nothing<off>
                ## higher than blue-rarity will spawn, and blue will be less likely than<off>
                ## usual.  Also nerfs the shield equip pool during the opening level.<off>

            #<Base Game>

                #<Flame Knuckle>

                    # Flame Knuckle drops the Nukem, so equip that.

                    #<hotfix><key>"SparkLevelPatchEntry-ApocBossGuaranteedBossPool0"</key><value>"MoonShotIntro_P,GD_DahlPowersuit_Knuckle.WeaponPools.Pool_Weapons_KnuckleLaser_EnemyUse,BalancedItems,,((ItmPoolDefinition=ItemPoolDefinition'GD_Itempools.Runnables.Pool_FlameKnuckle',InvBalanceDefinition=None,Probability=(BaseValueConstant=1,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1),bDropOnDeath=True))"</value><on>

                #</Flame Knuckle>

                #<Deadlift>

                    # UCP adds the Min Min Lighter (in addition to his default
                    # Vandergraffen), and the Kala shield.  We're NOT going to have
                    # Deadlift equip/drop the Kala in Playthrough 1 (Normal), though,
                    # because a Kala-using Deadlift at that point makes the fight far
                    # harder than it should be.  We're setting the Kala to drop from
                    # Nel in all playthroughs to compensate, though of course that's
                    # not a fight you can expect to take on until very late in the
                    # game.  For the Min Min Lighter, Deadlift already makes use of
                    # our drop style for the Vandergraffen, interestingly.

                    #<hotfix><key>"SparkLevelPatchEntry-ApocBossGuaranteedBossPool2"</key><value>"Deadsurface_P,GD_SpacemanDeadlift.WeaponPools.Pool_Weapons_Deadlift_Shocklaser,BalancedItems,,((ItmPoolDefinition=None,InvBalanceDefinition=WeaponBalanceDefinition'GD_Cork_Weap_Lasers.A_Weapons_Legendary.Laser_Tediore_5_Tesla',Probability=(BaseValueConstant=0.5,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1),bDropOnDeath=True),(ItmPoolDefinition=None,InvBalanceDefinition=WeaponBalanceDefinition'GD_Cork_Weap_Lasers.A_Weapons_Unique.Laser_Tediore_3_Vandergraffen',Probability=(BaseValueConstant=0.5,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1),bDropOnDeath=True))"</value><on>

                    #<hotfix><key>"SparkLevelPatchEntry-ApocBossGuaranteedDisable0"</key><value>"Deadsurface_P,GD_SpacemanDeadlift.Population.PawnBalance_SpacemanDeadlift,DefaultItemPoolList[2].PoolProbability,,(BaseValueConstant=0,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1)"</value><on>

                    #<hotfix><key>"SparkLevelPatchEntry-ApocBossGuaranteedDisable1"</key><value>"Deadsurface_P,GD_SpacemanDeadlift.Population.PawnBalance_SpacemanDeadlift_MercDay,DefaultItemPoolList[2].PoolProbability,,(BaseValueConstant=0,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1)"</value><on>

                #<Lost Legion Courier>

                    # This guy's only encountered during the mission "Red, then Dead" and
                    # doesn't ordinarily have any unique drops (even with UCP enabled).
                    # The Powersuit Noob, the next main enemy during that mission was
                    # changed by UCP to drop the Major Tom, but the powersuits don't
                    # actually use/equip "real" weapons.  So, just because I like having
                    # these weapons equippable, I'm adding Major Tom to the Courier as
                    # well.

                #<Deadlift>

                    ## UCP adds the Min Min Lighter (in addition to his default<off>
                    ## Vandergraffen), and the Kala shield.  We're NOT going to have<off>
                    ## Deadlift equip/drop the Kala in Playthrough 1 (Normal), though,<off>
                    ## because a Kala-using Deadlift at that point makes the fight far<off>
                    ## harder than it should be.  We're setting the Kala to drop from<off>
                    ## Nel in all playthroughs to compensate, though of course that's<off>
                    ## not a fight you can expect to take on until very late in the<off>

                #<Deadlift>

                    ## UCP adds the Min Min Lighter (in addition to his default<off>
                    ## Vandergraffen), and the Kala shield.  We're NOT going to have<off>
                    ## Deadlift equip/drop the Kala in Playthrough 1 (Normal), though,<off>
                    ## because a Kala-using Deadlift at that point makes the fight far<off>
                    ## harder than it should be.  We're setting the Kala to drop from<off>
                    ## Nel in all playthroughs to compensate, though of course that's<off>
                    ## not a fight you can expect to take on until very late in the<off>
                    ## game.  For the Min Min Lighter, Deadlift already makes use of<off>
                    ## our drop style for the Vandergraffen, interestingly.<off>

                    #<hotfix><key>"SparkLevelPatchEntry-ApocBossImprovedBossPool2"</key><value>"Deadsurface_P,GD_SpacemanDeadlift.WeaponPools.Pool_Weapons_Deadlift_Shocklaser,BalancedItems,,((ItmPoolDefinition=None,InvBalanceDefinition=WeaponBalanceDefinition'GD_Cork_Weap_Lasers.A_Weapons_Legendary.Laser_Tediore_5_Tesla',Probability=(BaseValueConstant=0.5,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1),bDropOnDeath=True),(ItmPoolDefinition=None,InvBalanceDefinition=WeaponBalanceDefinition'GD_Cork_Weap_Lasers.A_Weapons_Unique.Laser_Tediore_3_Vandergraffen',Probability=(BaseValueConstant=0.5,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1),bDropOnDeath=True))"</value><off>

                    ## because a Kala-using Deadlift at that point makes the fight far<off>

            #<Generic Boss Drop Weights (for non-weapon-using bosses)>

                #set GD_Itempools.DropWeights.DropODDS_BossUniques:ConstantAttributeValueResolver_0 ConstantValue 0.1<off> 

                #set GD_Itempools.DropWeights.DropODDS_BossUniqueRares:ConstantAttributeValueResolver_0 ConstantValue 0.33<off> 

            #</Generic Boss Drop Weights (for non-weapon-using bosses)>

                #<Deadlift>

                    ## UCP adds the Min Min Lighter (in addition to his default<off>
                    ## Vandergraffen), and the Kala shield.  We're NOT going to have<off>
                    ## Deadlift equip/drop the Kala in Playthrough 1 (Normal), though,<off>
                    ## because a Kala-using Deadlift at that point makes the fight far<off>
                    ## harder than it should be.  We're setting the Kala to drop from<off>
                    ## Nel in all playthroughs to compensate, though of course that's<off>
                    ## not a fight you can expect to take on until very late in the<off>
                    ## game.  For the Min Min Lighter, Deadlift already makes use of<off>
                    ## our drop style for the Vandergraffen, interestingly.<off>

    #<Stalker Shield Behavior (choose one)><MUT>

        #<Standard Game (no shield drops)>

            # With this option, Stalkers have the standard shield they've always had in
            # Borderlands, and will not drop a shield when killed.

            #<hotfix><key>"SparkLevelPatchEntry-ApocStalkerShields0"</key><value>"StalkerDummy_P,GD_StalkerDummy,DummyAttribute,1,1"</value><on>

        #</Standard Game (no shield drops)>

        #<Equip and Drop "Real" Shields>

            ## Stalkers will equip and drop "real" shields, just like other shielded<off>
            ## enemies in the game.<off>

            #<hotfix><key>"SparkLevelPatchEntry-ApocStalkerShields1"</key><value>",GD_Population_Stalker.Balance.PawnBalance_StalkerAmbush,DefaultItemPoolList[0].ItemPool,,ItemPoolDefinition'GD_CustomItemPools_MainGame.Gladiator.GreenPale'"</value><off>

            #<hotfix><key>"SparkLevelPatchEntry-ApocStalkerShields2"</key><value>",GD_Population_Stalker.Balance.PawnBalance_StalkerNeedle,DefaultItemPoolList[0].ItemPool,,ItemPoolDefinition'GD_CustomItemPools_MainGame.Gladiator.GreenPale'"</value><off>

            #<hotfix><key>"SparkLevelPatchEntry-ApocStalkerShields3"</key><value>",GD_Population_Stalker.Balance.PawnBalance_StalkerSpring,DefaultItemPoolList[0].ItemPool,,ItemPoolDefinition'GD_CustomItemPools_MainGame.Gladiator.GreenPale'"</value><off>
